 16 if (!self["bigshot"]) {
 17     /**
 18      * @namespace Bigshot namespace.
 19      *
 20      * Bigshot is a toolkit for zoomable images and VR panoramas.
 21      * 
 22      * <h3>Zoomable Images</h3>
 23      *
 24      * <p>The two classes that are needed for zoomable images are:
 25      *
 26      * <ul>
 27      * <li>{@link bigshot.Image}: The main class for making zoomable images. See the class docs
 28      *     for a tutorial.
 29      * <li>{@link bigshot.ImageParameters}: Parameters for zoomable images.
 30      * <li>{@link bigshot.SimpleImage}: A class for making simple zoomable images that don't
 31      * require the generation of an image pyramid.. See the class docs for a tutorial.
 32      * </ul>
 33      *
 34      * For hotspots, see:
 35      *
 36      * <ul>
 37      * <li>{@link bigshot.HotspotLayer}
 38      * <li>{@link bigshot.Hotspot}
 39      * <li>{@link bigshot.LabeledHotspot}
 40      * <li>{@link bigshot.LinkHotspot}
 41      * </ul>
 42      *
 43      * <h3>VR Panoramas</h3>
 44      *
 45      * <p>The two classes that are needed for zoomable VR panoramas (requires WebGL) are:
 46      *
 47      * <ul>
 48      * <li>{@link bigshot.VRPanorama}: The main class for making VR panoramas. See the class docs
 49      *     for a tutorial.
 50      * <li>{@link bigshot.VRPanoramaParameters}: Parameters for VR panoramas. 
 51      * </ul>
 52      *
 53      * For hotspots, see:
 54      *
 55      * <ul>
 56      * <li>{@link bigshot.VRHotspot}
 57      * <li>{@link bigshot.VRRectangleHotspot}
 58      * <li>{@link bigshot.VRPointHotspot}
 59      * </ul>
 60      */
 61     bigshot = {};
 62     
 63     /*
 64      * This is supposed to be processed using a minimalhttpd.IncludeProcessor
 65      * during development. The files must be listed in dependency order.
 66      */
 67     #include types.js
 68     #include Object.js
 69     #include Browser.js
 70     #include EventDispatcher.js
 71     #include Event.js
 72     #include TimedWeakReference.js
 73     #include ImageEvent.js
 74     #include VREvent.js
 75     #include FullScreen.js
 76     #include DataLoader.js
 77     #include DefaultDataLoader.js
 78     #include CachingDataLoader.js
 79     #include Hotspot.js
 80     #include PointHotspot.js
 81     #include Layer.js
 82     #include LabeledHotspot.js
 83     #include LinkHotspot.js
 84     #include HotspotLayer.js
 85     #include TileLayer.js
 86     #include LRUMap.js
 87     #include ImageTileCache.js
 88     #include ImageParameters.js
 89     #include ImageBase.js
 90     #include Image.js
 91     #include HTMLElementLayer.js
 92     #include HTMLDivElementLayer.js
 93     #include SimpleImage.js
 94     #include FileSystem.js
 95     #include SimpleFileSystem.js
 96     #include FolderFileSystem.js
 97     #include DeepZoomImageFileSystem.js
 98     #include ArchiveFileSystem.js
 99     #include VRTileCache.js
100     #include ImageVRTileCache.js
101     #include TextureTileCache.js
102     #include VRFace.js
103     #include WebGLUtil.js
104     #include TransformStack.js
105     #include WebGL.js
106     #include VRRenderer.js
107     #include AbstractVRRenderer.js
108     #include CSS3DVRRenderer.js
109     #include CSS3DTexturedQuad.js
110     #include CSS3DTexturedQuadScene.js
111     #include TexturedQuadScene.js
112     #include WebGLVRRenderer.js
113     #include TexturedQuad.js
114     #include WebGLTexturedQuad.js
115     #include WebGLTexturedQuadScene.js
116     #include VRPanoramaParameters.js
117     #include VRPanorama.js
118     #include VRHotspot.js
119     #include VRPointHotspot.js
120     #include VRRectangleHotspot.js
121     #include AdaptiveLODMonitorParameters.js
122     #include AdaptiveLODMonitor.js
123 }
